abstract: Criminal case against former Goldman Sachs programmer Sergey Aleynikov, charged with stealing some of firm's trading code, could result in mistrial following dispute between two jurors; argument includes allegation of 'food tampering' in jury room.
lead_paragraph: A dispute between two jurors, including an allegation of “food tampering,” threatens to prompt a mistrial in the case against Sergey Aleynikov, a former Goldman Sachs programmer.

headline.main: Food Fight on the Jury May Derail Code Trial
headline.print_headline: Food Fight on the Jury May Derail Code Trial

snippet: A dispute between two jurors, including an allegation of “food tampering,” threatens to prompt a mistrial in the case against Sergey Aleynikov, a former Goldman Sachs programmer.
